title: The Taking of Ariel, A Tale of Aeodar
description: Lord Arius can't help but intercede when he sees a slave being mercilessly beaten. He confiscates the slaves, returning home with them after seeing justice done to their former master.Rescued from a cruel fate and on the heels of a long journey, Ariel is more than ready for a bath, a shave and a thorough inspection from her new master. Download FREE from Smashwords in all ebook formats: http://www.smashwords.com/books/view/...
author: J.V. Altharas
